item.title: Feeling powerful with FFmpeg and Imagemagick
item.description: Introduction Recently, I took the task of writing the user documentation for the FOSS United Dashboard. It’s an event management dashboard made available to all the city chapter volunteers who can CRUD manage FOSS Meetups, Events, and Hackathons. Ngl, it was good and it is indeed very hard to write good documentation, I did terrible work. It slowly felt unexcited, so I thought of making some asset in it exciting
